nodes.text: Lanvorak Squad was a squad of Sith Jetpack Troopers in the Sith Eternal army. The unit was deployed on Exegol during a battle there between the Final Order—which included the Sith Eternal—and the Resistance. They were named after the weapon lanvorak.

Lanvorak Squad shares its name with the Star Wars Legends weapon lanvarok—a Sith weapon that Sidious himself labelled "a weapon of indiscriminate terror." The weapon debuted in Tales of the Jedi – Dark Lords of the Sith 4, a 1995 comic issue written by Tom Veitch and Kevin J. Anderson.
